subject: Track and Field
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Dwain Chambers helped Britain win back the European 4x100 meter relay title it lost in 2002 because of his failed drug test, but his triumph was soured when his teammate Darren Campbell refused to join Chambers, Marlon Devonish and Mark Lewis-Francis on their lap of honor yesterday in Goteborg, Sweden.
